name: Handguns
description: Proficiency in the use of handguns. Handguns skill affects accuracy and damage with handguns.

name: Automatics
description: Proficiency in the use of automatic firearms. Automatics skill affects accuracy and damage with automatic weapons.

name: Shotguns
description: Proficiency in the use of shotguns. Shotguns skill affects accuracy and damage with shotguns.

name: Melee
description: Proficiency in the use of melee weapons.

name: Rifles
description: Proficiency in the use of rifles. Rifles skill affects accuracy and damage with rifles.

name: Heavy Weapons
description: Proficiency in the use of heavy weapons such as machine guns and rocket launchers. Heavy Weapons skill affects accuracy and damage with heavy weapons.

name: Explosives
description: Knowledge and skill in handling and using explosives. Explosives skill determines success in using explosive devices and setting traps.

name: Hacking
description: Ability to breach computer systems and networks. Hacking skill determines success in hacking attempts and the complexity of systems that can be accessed.

name: Cybercombat
description: Skill in combat within virtual environments. Cybercombat skill affects success in virtual combat and the ability to defend against hacking attacks.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Knowledge and skill in defending computer systems and networks. Cybersecurity skill determines success in defending against hacking attempts and the complexity of security measures that can be implemented.

name: Rigging
description: Proficiency in controlling drones and vehicles remotely. Rigging skill affects the control and effectiveness of drones and vehicles operated remotely.

name: Conjuring
description: Skill in summoning and controlling spirits. Conjuring skill determines the effectiveness and control of summoned spirits.

name: Binding
description: Skill in controlling and binding summoned spirits. Binding skill affects the ability to compel and control summoned spirits, ensuring their obedience and preventing them from acting against the summoner's will.

name: Rituals
description: Knowledge and skill in performing magical rituals. Rituals skill determines success in performing magical rituals and the complexity of rituals that can be performed.

name: Deception
description: Ability to deceive others and manipulate situations. Deception skill affects success in lying, disguising, and manipulating others.

name: Negotiation
description: Ability to negotiate effectively and persuade others. Negotiation skill affects success in bargaining, persuading, and reaching agreements.

name: First Aid
description: Knowledge and skill in providing medical assistance. First Aid skill determines the effectiveness of medical treatment and the ability to stabilize wounded characters.

name: Stealth
description: Ability to move undetected and avoid detection. Stealth skill affects success in sneaking past enemies and remaining hidden.
